316460.name: Web Designer 10 Premium
316460.description:
Present your Let's Plays, video highlights, character equipment or hard-earned achievements on your own website. With no programming necessary, you can drag and drop fantastic designs together exactly the way you want them. You can even set up a team calendar and forum with the help of widgets. Thanks to over 50 premium features you can make a befitting online home for your guild. In addition to real gaming websites, you can also use Xara Web Designer 10 Premium to make websites for your organization, school and career.

Impressive websites. Simply self-made.

  • Direct integration of screenshots, Let's Plays and sounds
  • Logo design now even easier with Smart Shapes
  • Lots of widgets for integrating YouTube, Facebook, etc.
  • Website password protection

Premium Features
  • Optimal display for smartphones, tablets etc.
  • Over 70 website designs & 3000 design elements
  • Numerous e-commerce options including advanced search engine optimization and web statistics.
  • Dynamic effects, page transitions & animations
  • Includes 2000 MB webspace, own domain und 5 email accounts*

Websites as strong as your clan.

Your website on all devices
Checking your website out on your smart phone when you're on the move is no problem at all — you can create various versions of your site for different display sizes. Text and graphics are automatically synced. You define the layout and size.

Clan logo, including 3D design
Every guild, legion and clan is unique, and your logo should be too. Draw your own logo as a vector graphic with impressive 3D effects right in the program. You can then drag it to make it the perfect size for your website, a team jersey or whatever you want.

Merchandise in your own shop
Already have your own t-shirts, hats and more? Then sell them directly on your clan website. You can integrate your own online shop for fans and members.

Integrate Let's Play videos in Full HD
Show all your battle highlights in top quality. Integrate your videos in true HD quality at 1080p to retain realistic graphics and an authentic gaming feel.

Impressive animations & effects.
Impress your visitors with animations, special effects and dynamic page transitions. You can make all of these yourself right in the program.

Password protection for secret agreements.
Websites don't always have to be public. You can hide your team plans and tactics from the eyes of the enemy by providing your website with a password in the MAGIX Online World.

*This offer from MAGIX Online World is valid in combination with a hosting service offer (at least the free hosting package) and includes one domain (all endings except .tv, .photo, .photos and .photography available) which can be used for free for 12 months. After the period of free use, the domain can be used further according to the terms & conditions of MAGIX Online World. Find out more at .

Important note:

This version of Web Designer 10 Premium has been developed exclusively for Steam. For this reason, templates and content that have been additionally purchased from the MAGIX or XARA shop cannot be used. We apologize for this inconvenience.
316460.supported_languages:
英语*, 德语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
